SENTRY API

Welcome to the AXI Sentry API.

The Sentry API gathers information gathered by Commanders in Elite: Dangerous using the Elite: Dangerous Data Network and monitors it for Thargoid Activity.

Recorded data is available through the following API Endpoints:

API Endpoints

  • Systems - https://sentry.antixenoinitiative.com/systems

    Returns all recorded systems and current activity status.

  • Incursions - https://sentry.antixenoinitiative.com/incursions

    Returns current active incursions.

  • Incursions History - https://sentry.antixenoinitiative.com/incursionshistory

    Returns all recorded Incursion encounters from EDDN.

  • Presence - https://sentry.antixenoinitiative.com/presence

    Returns all recorded Presence levels.

NOTE: Presence level data is submitted manually via the AXI discord as this is not available in Journal Data.
